snippet: The city of Detroit on Monday evening proposed new details, including potentially larger cuts to pensions for some retirees, for its plan for paying off portions of its debts.
abstract: Detroit proposes new details, including potentially larger cuts to pensions for some retirees, for its plan for paying off portions of its debts and emerging in 2014 from the nation's largest municipal bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: The city of Detroit on Monday evening proposed new details, including potentially larger cuts to pensions for some retirees, for its plan for paying off portions of its debts.

headline.main: Detroit’s Revised Debt Plan May Cut Pensions Deeper
headline.print_headline: Detroit’s Revised Debt Plan May Cut Pensions Deeper
